title: Patriots, Anthony Davis, Big Ben, and the Blazing 5
itunes:title: Patriots, Anthony Davis, Big Ben, and the Blazing 5
description:
Colin discusses why the the New England Patriots are wasting QB Tom Brady, why NBA owners believe the Los Angeles Lakers are tampering so they can sign New Orleans Pelicans F Anthony Daivs, why Pittsburgh Steelers QB Ben Roethlisberger can't be put in a certain era, and his Blazing 5 picks for the weekend. Guests include Chris Broussard, Joe Thomas, Greg Jennings, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
